basics.name: Iosif Vigh
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Senior Software Engineer with experience in creating complete projects from scratch to production in Node.js and Laravel. I write code as clean as possible so that the next dev will be happy to maintain it and the junior will quickly grasp it. Curious by nature, I'm always learning new things.

work.name: Casa4 (own LTD)
work.summary: Contractor for various clients through my own LTD. Worked on diverse projects, specializing in PHP, Laravel, and Node.js. Involved both in team-based development and solo application building from design to deployment.
highlights: ElectroRent: I contributed with Laravel code to fix bugs and add new features for a complex tool-renting platform.
Aliat Optic: Designed and produced an invoicing app, integrating external FTP data via AWS Lambda and DynamoDB.
The Hurlingham Club: Managed system migration to internal servers, resolving a wide range of dev-ops issues.
TicketTailor: Enhanced the API of a large PHP application with both bugfixes and new features.
↪ Technologies: Laravel, Node.js, AWS Lambda, MySQL, Terraform, AWS, VueJS, NextJS, CLI, Bash

work.name: Artetra

highlights: As an acting CTO, I work to translate the business requirements into project features
Responsible with the application architecture and sometimes with smaller granular tasks. I'm managing a team of 3-4 developers and I have to provide them with any assistance when they need it.

work.name: True Compliance
highlights: Built the main API of the system. Contributed to all the adjacent applications which constituted the entire ecosystem deployed as serverless functions on AWS with Laravel Vapor. Contributed in designing the ecosystem's architecture.

Some notable projects assigned solely to me: A reporting app. which would create a report from any SQL provided; A bespoke real time caching system which saved processed relational data into a no-sql database.
↪ Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Laravel Vapor, AWS, VueJS, Node.js, Serverless Framework, CLI, Bash

work.name: Skin Analytics
work.summary: Designing and developing our main applications and maintaining the AWS infrastructure.
highlights: Biggest task was the migration from a no-sql database to a relational database which resulted in a 11x speed increase. I achieved this with no change to the frontend or the end user's journey.
↪ Technologies: Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript, AWS, Loopback, pm2, Angular
